price: Pharaoh said to the chiefs around him, “This is indeed a learned magician!
arabic: قَالَ لِلۡمَلَإِ حَوۡلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٞ
